title: The Witcher, Iron Man, Isekai Metaller, and more!
tags: The Witcher: Blood Stone #1 :: Profile :: Dark Horse ComicsAncient dwarven mines have attracted treasure hunters, and legend has it a horned beast is killing them. With no signs of an attack, Geralt surveys the lay of the land, but the mountains are deadly, and the mines even deadlier.
